item.title: Setting up Github Profile
item.description: After a long break from mending my Github, I returned and started with setting up my github profile. Basics In order to set up the profile page add various personal details on the profile page, a new repository is needed, with the name set up as github username. (for instance, in my case, my id is uk960214, therefore I created a repository with the name “uk960214”) The readme.md file on this repository will be shown in the profile page.
